item.title: Minneapolis ICE shooting live updates: Tensions rise after 2nd shooting
item.description: The ICE agent who shot Renee Good suffered internal bleeding, multiple U.S. officials familiar with his medical condition told ABC News.

item.title: Sick astronaut, rest of crew splash down in Pacific after undocking from ISS
item.description: Crew-11 splashed down off the coast of San Diego, California, early on Thursday.

item.title: Verizon says situation resolved after hourslong outage impacted thousands
item.description: Verizon said it would "work through the night until service is restored" and said it would provide "account credits" for any customer who lost service...

item.title: WATCH: Clashes with federal agents escalate in Minneapolis
item.description: Tensions continue in Minneapolis after the fatal shooting of Renee Good by an ICE agent.

item.title: WATCH: Danish, Greenlandic officials express opposition to US control over Greenland
